info.title: Dromo
info.description: Dromo's APIs provide convenient programmatic access to your uploads and schemas. You can use them to create powerful automated workflows.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: end index, defaults to max return value, 10000

get.summary: Get presigned download URL for upload data

200.description: Returns a signed URL to access the upload's data.

presigned_url.description: The presigned download URL to access the upload's data.

get.summary: Get presigned download URL for headless import data

200.description: Returns a signed URL to access the headless import's result data.

presigned_url.description: The presigned download URL to access the headless import's result data.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: total number of imports to return, defaults 100 max 1000

oneOf.description: Name of the file being imported (exclude if using initial_data)
Complete JSON data to be imported, max size 15MB (exclude if using a file)

404.description: No schema found with that id

detail.example: Must supply password for password auth

private_key.example:
-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
b3BlbnNzaC1rZXktdjEAAAAABG5vbmUAAAAEbm9uZQAAAAAAAAABAAABlwAAAAdzc2gtcn
...
-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
private_key.description: Required when auth_type is KEY (OpenSSH format)

password.description: Optional - omit or use empty string to preserve existing password

private_key.example:
-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
b3BlbnNzaC1rZXktdjEAAAAABG5vbmUAAAAEbm9uZQAAAAAAAAABAAABlwAAAAdzc2gtcn
...
-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
private_key.description: Optional - omit or use empty string to preserve existing key

credentials.description: ID of SFTP credentials to use

schema.description: ID of import schema to use

file_regex.description: Optional regex pattern to filter files (null accepts all files)

credentials.description: ID of SFTP credentials to use

schema.description: ID of import schema to use

file_regex.description: Optional regex pattern to filter files (null accepts all files)

api_key.name: X-Dromo-License-Key
api_key.description: This backend API key is different than your frontend license key. Please use the "Backend" license key from your [Dromo Dashboard](https://dashboard.dromo.io/).
